website_summaries.verdict: As Hush Puppies stays true to its principle by providing comfortable footwear perfect for everyday wear, here comes the Hush Puppies Gil. It is ideal for people who do not want the complexity of lacing. With the Velcro strap, it can easily let the foot slip in, and you are good to go.Among the low-top Hush Puppies sneakers, the Gil slip-on is equipped with ZeroG system that makes the shoe lightweight and comfortable. Approved by PDAC, it is perfect for people with flat feet and neuropathy, and old-aged users.
pros: A lot of people have testified that the Hush Puppies Gil is a comfortable sneaker perfect for walking
Perfect for people with a hip problem, it is a lightweight sneaker equipped with the ZeroG technology, according to many reviewers
Plenty of testers have appreciated this slip-on sneaker with the Velcro strap because it is easy to put on
Like other Hush Puppies sneakers, the low-top Gil has a stylish design perfect for casual or dressy wear, as per several buyers
A handful of wearers have pointed out that this sneaker is perfect for old-aged wearers, especially those with neuropathy and other foot issues
It offers an excellent fit that can accommodate people with wide feet or high instep, as some purchasers have testified
The Hush Puppies Gil is available in different colorways that are appreciated by several patrons
A couple of reviewers have mentioned that it has a soft leather upper
It has an outsole with excellent traction that prevents slippage, according to a few
This slip-on is among the Hush Puppies sneakers with an affordable price tag
cons: A few customers have muttered that the low-top Hush Puppies Gil has an outsole that wears out or comes off easily

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable Chinese Counterfeits
customer_reviews.text: I have worn these shoes for several years, the ones I ordered in the last month were definitely counterfeit. The outer leather was stiff and hard not very soft and plush like my previous shoes. The shoes were not comfortable and I do not know who the supplier is for this outfit but I know that these are not hush puppies. In my opinion they are very poor-quality counterfeit shoes. The leather tells it all. I can put my fingers on my earlier Pairs and it is soft and subtle and comfortable and these replacement shoes are thin and hard and stiff. Someone needs to contact hushpuppy and I think that I will.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie L. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Not for diabetics
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this shoe for about 3 months & seems to be well made, but that is as good as it gets. I am a diabetic & I bought the shoe based on good ratings, but the shoe is inadequate for neuropathy nerve pain. The insole insert is thin & gives very little cushioning. To make the shoe wearable I threw the pathetic insole away & replaced it with an insole insert with adequate cushioning. And of course this raised the cost of the shoe. Another issue with the shoe is that the design of the single Velcro strap makes for a sloppy fit. Two straps per shoe makes for a snugger fit.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Hush Puppies is a Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: For a long time I have been wearing New Balance Men's Leather Walking Shoes for the large amount of walking I do (5 miles daily). Somehow I discovered Hush Puppies Men's Gil Slip-On for a few more dollars. They are worth every penny. They look much better and can be worn as a dress shoe. They fit exactly as expected. They are exceedingly comfortable when worn for prolonged periods. This shoe, which comes in numerous colors, is my new walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Alan L. Rubin MD

customer_reviews.title: Best walking shoes I've bought in ages!
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the most comfortable walking shoes I've bought in some time! The quality of the materials and workmanship are both excellent. I am recovering from total knee replacement surgery and these are VERY easy for me to put on and take off, yet they offer great support to my feet. I often have a hard time finding comfortable shoes, but these fit the bill perfectly and I would definitely buy them again! Good job, Hush Puppies!
customer_reviews.author: David B. Jones

customer_reviews.title: they are old man shoes.
customer_reviews.text: My father in law is 86 years old and tired of tying shoes. He slips these on closes the velcro tab and goes on about his day driving me nuts. if he's not complaining about the weather or politics then hes napping. Having these shoes is one less thing for him to complain about. If you got an parent or an in law that complains about shoes get them a pair of the hush puppies, and be done with it
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A comfortable fit and dashing appearance
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen the Hush puppy line since the 70s. Online experience has not been kind in the realm of shoes for me but this arrived and looked great. I had ordered the double wide since regular sizes have not been working and I was happily satisfied. My job requires being on my feet for 5 or more hours a day continuously and since obtaining these have not had any pain at all. I have flat feet so I also purchased Dr. Sholes inserts and the two of these have eliminated all the previous problems I had. Walking distances no longer bothers me and I'm over 60 so... lol. Recommend this brand fully.
customer_reviews.author: ron lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen Hush Puppies since I was a little kid when Mom used to buy them for me. I was delighted when I saw these. Had to buy me a pair. I love these shoes. Probably should've bought a size smaller but these feel very good and they give my feet room for swelling as I am diabetic. So these are the perfect shoe for my feet. I wear them for my good shoes so not all the time. They'll last me for many years to come. The price is right also. Can't believe I'm wearing Hush Puppies again!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley E. Popejoy Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Needed a shoe with a velcro closure
customer_reviews.text: First wore Hush Puppies in the 1950's. So, when I saw the name and reasonable reviews, I was sold. Had shoulder replacement surgery and will be having knee replacement surgery in several moths. So, I was looking for a velcro closure with a reasonable size toe box and what I had hoped would be a slip resistant sole. The shoe has done everything that I have wanted from it. I feel very comfortable and save wearing it. It is easy to put on and take off by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Alan C. Burye

customer_reviews.title: Hushpuppies are my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Hushpuppy is my go-to shoe brand. They are comfortable, consistent, and classy. I can buy them at a brick and mortar store when one's available, or order them online when the store's aren't available. The size is always consistent, and that same size always fits nicely. I wear this to church when they're shiny new, and to work in the yard when they're older. These have the strap instead of the laces, and are not as tight as the laces. But the fit is tight enough to be comfortable and I appreciate the ease of getting into them.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Linstrom

customer_reviews.title: Very Strange
customer_reviews.text: I've taken a size nine for 30 years . I ordered a size nine in this shoe and it was much too large. I then ordered a size 8.1/2 and its a little bit large. I'm afraid to order a size 8 which I'm sure would be too small. So, I've decided to dtick with the size 8 .1/2 even though it does slip on my heel . I'm very perplexed over this because as I said previously I've taken a size 9 for the last 30 years. So, You should probably order a 1/2 size smaller than you actually measure. Be sure to get free returns.
customer_reviews.author: Bocker

customer_reviews.title: Diabetics take note!  The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: As a diabetic with peripheral neuropathy, these shoes have been a godsend. After a recent toe amputation, I bought a pair and they are simply awesome. They are A-1 in my expienced opinioin and fit superbly without any areas that rub the skin. They're very comfortabe as well. My surgeon remarked about them at my last visit gave them a high thumbs-up rating. I wear them daily. Absolutely no complaints. Hush Puppis make quality shoes. Fellow diabetics take note!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Mac

customer_reviews.title: True to size and easy for my Dad to put on with the velcro closure
customer_reviews.text: The fit is as expected (true to size) but the shoe is mostly man-made not leather. They need to revisit the $77.31 pricing on these shoes, I only hope they last my Dad several years as he is diabetic and using a walker in a Assisted Living facility.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly light weight and comfortable - perfect for people with diabetes.
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for my diabetic father since his feet are badly swollen and in rough shape, I couldn't believe how lightweight these shoes are when they arrived, they also feel super soft from inside, finding shoes for my dad is always a big challenge because of the condition of his feet, I can't believe we finally found the right shoes! He just called me to ask for another pair in a different color, definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: AGM

customer_reviews.title: felt off balance and could not walk......
customer_reviews.text: too narrow, felt like I was walking on edge of seam. toe to heel uncomfortable....strange for hush puppies which should be more comfortable. I am a dentist and I know comfort in shoes.....I am on feet a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Phil

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate.  perfect for the elderly.
customer_reviews.text: As one other person reviewed. Purchased for dad who has a tough time bending over, etc. My dad is 84 and is a slow mover. He just keeps trucking along, but he has a parkinson's, a light case. So he has the hunched back & the baby step shuffles. These are the best shows ever for him to put on!! I will buy these again in less than a heartbeat!!!! I bought these outright. No exchange for reviews here.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and functional everyday shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice comfortable shoe...easy to take on and off with velcro fastener. I now have two pairs, brown and black. They're comfortable enough for wear around the house, but also sturdy enough to wear while driving and in modest outside walking activities. My one concern is how long the velcro will last. The Velco fastener on other similar shoes I've had tends to fatigue over time and require replacing in a little over a year. We'll see how it goes with these. In the mean time these have become my everyday shoes. Very comfortable and functional.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ross

customer_reviews.title: All in all we are happy with these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my 90 year old husband because he just can't tie shoes anymore. He likes the velcro closure. When we had previously tried velcro closure athletic shoes, the strap would not come over far enough to cover all the velcro & then the hems of his pants were getting ruined. We do not have that problem with these shoes - the strap comes over far enough to cover. This might not be a problem for other men, but he has a very high arch - thus the non-closure on other shoes. All in all we are happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: RHatfield

customer_reviews.title: This shoe wears well
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these shoes for years because they are comfortable and are wide enough for the feet of diabetics. They hold up well, I wear them inside and outside of the home. After about 3 years of daily use the innersole shows some wear but hey so do the tires on your car. The average guy in his 70's will get tired of looking at them before he wears them out. For the price, I treat myself to a new pair every few years.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Mcelhiney

customer_reviews.title: Like the style and color
customer_reviews.text: My puppies fit is acceptable. No much in the way of arch support or foot cushioning. I will have to go out and buy shoe inserts for that. Drat, spend more money.. Like the style and color. I bought these online because I could not find them in the store. I will keep them but when it comes to shoes its best to buy at a brick and mortar store. Best to try shoes on unless its a brand you own and plan to buy the same exact thing.
customer_reviews.author: mrpms

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for travel. If you have to remove your shoes at the airport, the shoes can be easily removed and slipped on again at security spots. The shoes are provide great comfort for everyday wear.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Donnelly

customer_reviews.title: Dad like these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for father. Very well made shoe. He states shoe fits him well and he like the fact there's room in the toe and that he can wear a little heavier sock and says there's just enough arch support. Velcro closure is well made and looks like it will hold up over time. We will be ordering another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes but they run large in size
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoes and they look to be well-made (no squeaking). I wear a size 10.5 in every other kind of footwear - boots, shoes, slippers. So I ordered the 10.5 in this shoe and it's too large. The 10 would have been the best fit. But I can't return them now and if I fasten the top strap tightly, they are OK so I'll go ahead and wear them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stimpert

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes - Run A Bit Small
customer_reviews.text: 11.5-D wearers should go for 12 or generally a half size up. They're remarkable light but durable so far. I like the velcro strap going to the side, it eliminates the trouser wear that crooked straight across bands cause when catching the hem of pants. They're really comfortable to walk in and I have less back problems with these than I did with Dr Scholl's cheapies. Overall they're a bit snug, but I'm sure that'll loosen with wear, but next time I'll go with the 12's. Hush puppies aren't what they used to be but they're still a cut above.
customer_reviews.author: Richard The Buying Hearted

customer_reviews.title: A very nice looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is a bit loose in the heel for my husband, but the toe box and the rest of the shoe fits quite well. I bought heel liners for the back of the shoes so that they would fit better. The velcro closure is very nice, as it lies flat and is easy for him (stroke victim) to manage by himself. He says they are very comfortable, and I think they are very nice looking. A good product!
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well fitting.  This is the second pair we've ordered.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a pair of these for my husband over a year ago. He wore them out. So, these were ordered to replace the original pair. While they seem a bit overly shiny looking when they first arrive, they wear well and provide comfort and easy on and off velcro fastening. Please note that my husband has very high arches and often velcro fasteners do not quite reach far enough to provide a good hold. The fasteners on this shoe are long enough.
customer_reviews.author: canonwren

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are light
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 90-year old Dad so it's easy for him to put on shoes. He liked it because they are light around 2 lbs. vs. 4 lbs like other brand. He liked the roomy toe box and the easy velcro strap. The shoes look nice. The leather is not soft, hopefully they will get softer as time goes. The pad inside is not very cushioned. I will probably take it out and replace with another pad.
customer_reviews.author: Michele B.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought earlier.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shoe that would open WIDE to slip on my dad's swollen feet. He is normally a size 12, but at times, due to his health, his left foot would swell up really bad and he couldn't get on his shoe. They are very light, adjustable so I can tighten them appropriately, and seem like a good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mommabear

customer_reviews.title: It looks great!!!
customer_reviews.text: These pair are new. It did not came with original box but looks great! Best price for the best deal!
customer_reviews.author: JEFF M

customer_reviews.title: Hush Puppies used to be great shoes, but 'Made in China' lack of quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Hush Puppies used to be great shoes, but 'Made in China' lack of quality shows. The exterior material is now cheaper and the color is not cordovan brown anymore like my old ones. The width, which I ordered was too wide, my fault, so I returned them. I wouldn't purchase again due to cheap appearing material and color. I might try black if it weren't for the look of the fake leather, whatever it is. Delivery and refund were tops.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Reidburn

customer_reviews.title: Questionable
customer_reviews.text: I wear hush puppies and like them Have had pretty good service but the last pair I bought completely disintegrated just sitting in my closet new in the box just 14 months waiting to be put in service Soles literally fell apart If that ever occurs again me and Hush Puppies brand will be done
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is a guess.
customer_reviews.text: Luckily I guessed right. Unfortunately, we all know that sizing can be arbitrary on the part of the manufacturer, but to compound the problem, Hushpuppy and some others on Amazon do not use "D, W, 2W, 3W, 4W". Instead, they use "N, D, W, and XW", where the equivalents are not clearly appropriate. e.g.: XW can be a number of equivalent sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find shoes wide enough and leather that is fairly priced. No break in time, we were lucky to try these out and like them. No drawbacks so far, wearing them every other day for two months and holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: kfez

customer_reviews.title: This a comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is very comfortable to wear and very easy for an older person to put on and take off. Two years ago i bought this same shoe and have recently rotated it to the everyday wear. The leather takes a good shine and keeps its looks. The inter material wears faster but is only a man made material and not leather.
customer_reviews.author: Charles B

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this shoes. Had ordered a pair of hush puppies 4 years ago for my husband loved them. Good quality leather shoes. With a diagnoses of parkinson we needed a Velcro shoes. These fit fine but look like cheap plastic shoes. I didn’t send them back because we needed Velcro shoes now. Very disappointed in hush puppie company. Just not the shoes they use to be.
customer_reviews.author: vivian wedel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all around shoes - Really great to have at airports.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and comfortable shoes. I bought the extra wide shoes and the size allows for a very comfortable fit. These shoes are very comfortable for walking long distances (over 5 miles). Another feature making the shoe a winner in my book is the quick manner in which shoes can be taken on and off due to the adjustable velcro straps. If you travel a lot these are the easiest shoes to take on and off when going through airport security.
customer_reviews.author: Aruba

customer_reviews.title: Toe box is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these same shoes in black from a foot clinic a couple of years ago and with the special inserts they have worked very well for my husband's foot issue.
customer_reviews.author: C. Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are shoes
customer_reviews.text: I searched on line for days and days to find a brand which featured long straps to cover the "sticky" part which tend to eat pants cuffs. One popular brand was returned with short straps. These straps are long enough, but the inside quality is the same as any other brand. The sock liner is rough (and I cannot wear socks, which makes it kind of scratchy) and the arch support does not exist. They were almost returned because the quality is the same as less expensive brands but I decided I do not need any more hassles with shoes which will always be used indoors and never outside. If you walk a lot, this ain't it.
customer_reviews.author: Foamy Mustache

customer_reviews.title: Will order again!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes. The fit was just a tiny bit larger than I have experienced with another supplier, but not enough to be out of the "fits as expected" category. For me, the tiny extra meant they fit perfectly. The shoes seem well made, and are better looking than the similar but somewhat less expensive model from a different supplier that they replaced. I also like the rubber soles, compared to the PVC or whatever soles on the ones I am retiring, as those became quite slippery on carpets once worn. The rubber seems to grip better. I plan to order these again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: 1stHand

customer_reviews.title: Insole disintegrated in less than six months
customer_reviews.text: The shoes we OK for about four months. Then the insole began to disintegrate. The top of the sole is actually a quarter inch deep grid of hard plastic and without the insole, is very, very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have had real good luck with this brand and style!
customer_reviews.text: I have had real good luck with this brand and style of shoe as well. They fit good, are comfortable and hold up well. I a heavy set guy (size 13 medium) who also has arthritis in my right knee and hip; these shoes offered good support for the money but to make them significantly better I took out the original factory inserts and put in a pair of Sole Airr Orthotic Full Length Performance Shoe Insoles. Now, these are my every day shoes. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: JimJN1

customer_reviews.title: Finally
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes for my son. Found shoes that truly fit. He has a large foot, and hard to find the true width. These shoes fit perfect. He said he will keep them in mind when he needs another pair of shoes. Mary C. Campbell
customer_reviews.author: Mary C. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great for us old guys!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with Hush Puppies! Having a "drop foot" and trouble walking , I found that these shoes are not only LIGHT, but fit well. They have just the right amount of "slip" on wood floors, to help me to not trip due to shoes that GRAB the floor! Need the cane less. The fit is fine & price is much less than local store.
customer_reviews.author: dckdarby

customer_reviews.title: Unusual in this day and age they are true to size.
customer_reviews.text: After buying a pair for my father I decided to try a pair for myself. They were the same quality and appearance but a little large. I normally wear a 10.5 wide, which is what I ordered. They were a little large. I can wear a thick cotton or wool sock and cinch them down to fit. Not sure if a half inch smaller would be to small. Once I got them on they were very comfortable. Just be aware that they cut generously and are probably true to size.
customer_reviews.author: William R Baird

customer_reviews.title: Leather? Not!
customer_reviews.text: Listing claims shoe is made of leather. It is evident that it is not. Just feel it then smell the obvious strong smell synthetic material. Smells like vinyl.
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great fit
customer_reviews.text: Always a little hesitant about ordering shoes without trying them on but I ordered my size and width hoping they would be true to size and they were. I ordered these to wear to work only, hope they last, we will see, for now it’s a 5 star
customer_reviews.author: CharlieL

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoe meets all expectations. Comfortable, light weight, perfect fit. Delivery was a problem. Seller shipped in a timely manner, but package got lost in USPS system for 2-1/2 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Dayton C. Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Dad loves them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my father who has extra-wide feet that swell and he has difficulty walking. Finding shoes that are comfortable is very hard to do. He loves them!! Easy to put on and very lightweight. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Salty Seal

customer_reviews.title: Good Dog!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son, who was Problem Feet since being in the military (common issue I hear), and he just loves these. He made a face at me when he saw the label 'Hush Puppies', like these were for old guys or something, but he put them on and the face changed to a smile. Nice! They are warm though, so maybe not for summertime, and nubuck, so maybe not for really wet days, but they are well made, and the sizing was accurate. We'd definitely buy again, and Hush Puppies has a younger fan now, so there's that. :-)
customer_reviews.author: K. Jensen

customer_reviews.title: charged for return, UPS 2 mths late in return.
customer_reviews.text: I have information that package was deliverd 8/18, signed receipt RUIZ. difficulties to reach CS by phone
customer_reviews.author: carole lewis

customer_reviews.title: OK for swollen feet; but not the best
customer_reviews.text: While the Hush Puppies fit decently, they never felt truly comfortable. The price however is exceptionally reasonable compared to the Propets which fit more comfortably but were much higher priced.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Listed as 'free return'
customer_reviews.text: the product was fine but I only tried them on... didn't know my exact size which was part of the reason I selected this particular shoe as it says 'free returns'... well its a 'partially reimbursed' return... meaning you pay to ship it back (I shipped it back in a smaller box than it arrived in using the least expensive method at the USPS) and they credit your account a certain sum... in this case $5.48... actual postage was $8.60. Not a huge deal, I turned around and ordered what I hope will be the correct size, but if they say returns are free that's what they should be.
customer_reviews.author: stinkybarbie

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied 87 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 87 year old dad whose feet got wider near his toes in the last few years. He went from a 71/2 Wide similar shoe to these 71/2 extra wide Hush Puppies. He loves them. They are light weight and the all leather shoe breathes better than his last shoe which were man made uppers. The extra width helps his toes to have more wiggle room which his foot doctor told him was very important at his age. Large amount of Velcro on the strap closure to fit different widths across top of foot. Delivery was quick as usual - and well packaged. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Lu

customer_reviews.title: way too big
customer_reviews.text: My usual size is a 14 w, I have no problems with most shoes being this size. I purchased them for the style, and I really liked the style, however these shoes felt one size larger than 14, it stated 14 Wide on the shoe, but my foot just swim around in those big things. If they had a 13 1/2 wide I think they would fit perfect, but with most manufacturers they don't make 1/2 sizes in large shoes. I am very disappointed because I really liked the look and style of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Frank S

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for swollen feet!
customer_reviews.text: Product fits my father well. He has swollen feet, and these shoes are very comfortable for him. Ordered his normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes these shoes. He wanted slippers to wear outdoors and these are better because they are shoes and comfortable :-)
customer_reviews.author: romansjoy

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable shoes I have owned. When I first picked up the package the shoes came in I thought the box empty, it was just because they are a very light weight shoe which makes them so comfortable, I have no problem wearing these shoes a good part of the day. The removable insert is a plus also. It is hard for me to find a comfortable shoe for the problems I have, but these shoes are great. I like them so much I plan on buying another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: krh316

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. I wear extra wide shoes and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur H. Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a shoe that fits well and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a double wide shoe and they are very hard to find. He loves these, plus not having to deal with laces. They look very nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Ddoll

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and extremely durable
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a pair of these shows. They have held up very well for six years. They're still wearable and very practical. The only reason I finally ordered a new pair is simply because I needed some newer-looking shoes for public events. These are very comfortable and extremely durable.
customer_reviews.author: Doczilla

customer_reviews.title: Nice and lightweight but a little loose
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised and a little disappointed that my velcro closure Hushpuppies fit a bit loose and "sloppy". Also the tongue is very stiff and combined with the looseness, the movement rubbed on the instep and created a small bleeding spot. I'm trying to figure out if I'll be able to adjust the shoe so I can wear it again.
customer_reviews.author: John T Moore

customer_reviews.title: Hush Puppies are always a great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son, as he prefers Velcro closures due to his need for an extra wide width, and when he put them on, you couldn't wipe the smile off his face! He said they are so comfortable. I always have to buy him a size 11 because shoes are never wide enough for him however, knowing the Hush Puppies name, I decided to just go down a half size to 10.5 EW. Perfect fit for him!
customer_reviews.author: Heather L. Colby

customer_reviews.title: Works ... while the velcro lasts
customer_reviews.text: This was a good pair of shoes ... while the velcro lasted. A year into fairly regular use for work, the velcro on the left shoe has stopped fastening. I've not had this happen with any other shoe I've owned. I've tried most recommended solutions for getting the velcro fastener to hold, but it will not. I have no choice but to dispose of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Subramanian

customer_reviews.title: They are quite comfortable with no issues the first day of wearing them
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 3E and have a bit more room than what other 3E shoes that I have. They are quite comfortable with no issues the first day of wearing them. I would have liked to see a bit more arch support. After wearing them a day, I decided to go out and get a second pair as the price is more than reasonable. It is always nice when you find a good buy its always nice to have that second pair available and not to search high and low for another pair.
customer_reviews.author: OldnGray

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit well and fastened easily.
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were as advertised and fit very well. I have been having trouble tying shoes because of arthritis and lowered ability to reach my shoes when putting them on and off. The velcro fastening solved this problem very well. I have worn Hush Puppies for many years these lived up to my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: sjm

customer_reviews.title: Gil Slip-on Huash Puppies
customer_reviews.text: I needed a Velcro strap shoe that look like a casual dress shoe yet provide an easy tightening strap. I looked at several manufacturers. I decided to try this brand as they looked good and were the least expensive. They arrive very timely and have fit very well. They are a bit large but I needed the size I ordered and they are comfortable, look good and are easy to put on. I need US 13 2E in New Balance and ordered this size which seems fine. The support is better than my walkers. My shoe size has increased as I have aged.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Waltman

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were very nice but too small and too narrow
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were very nice but too small and too narrow; they also did not open far enough. My husband has gained a lot of weight plus his one foot is swollen so he couldn't get the shoe on. He has a doctor appointment to find out the problem. I ordered a different style shoe and also wider and a half size larger; these have worked out better.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela E. Ardinger

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Went on a six week trip to Europe and they saved my feet. Cobblestones look great but are terrible to walk on. These shoes worked protected my feet and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Harper

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes in August for my son.... The Velcro fell apart several days ago. Four months later! A 75.00 pair of shoes should last longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: marji

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, light weight, easy to put on and take off. I'm diabetic and need good fitting shoes. These fit perfect and do not cause any HOT spots on my feet. Easy slip in and slip off as well
customer_reviews.author: J P

customer_reviews.title: eXCELLENT QUALITY AND VALUE
customer_reviews.text: ELIMINATES TYING LACES AND CONFORMS TO FOOT COMFORT WITH LITTLE EFFORT
customer_reviews.author: Bookman

customer_reviews.title: Light, Comfortable Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I like the thick, comfortable sole of the shoe and the ease with which it can be slipped on! Also, I like the fact that it is very light and I can lift my leg much easier. This is important to me when I drive since I have a right hip/leg problem!
customer_reviews.author: Mont9

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my Dad and he normally wears a 12 W but the shoe was narrow for him and hurt the top of his foot. Would've love to order a 12 XW, but couldn't find the size anywhere except black and he didn't want black. Sturdy and comfortable sole.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful shoe!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I've ever put my foot in. In my 91 years old and I've tried a bunch. these are the winner by far!!
customer_reviews.author: John H. Norris

customer_reviews.title: satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't owned hush puppies in years and in so stating didn't know how they ran size wise.I ordered a half siz larger. Needless to say they were a little loose as Hush Puppies run true to size. In fact I ordered a different style a few days ago and in the size I wear. Wasn't surprised that they were perfect! I love both pairs and can't say enough about Amazon prime. Simply amazing. Great shoe at an awsome price. I am very fussy about shoes and i go more for comfort than style. Will definetley buy more!
customer_reviews.author: kittylover

customer_reviews.title: I do not like these shoes and regret purchasing them
customer_reviews.text: I do not like these shoes and regret purchasing them. For me, they seem to be overall a half size to large yet too narrow for the middle of the foot and too wide in the heel. I'm trying heel pads to keep my heel from slipping but they are not working and fall off when putting on or removing the shoes. Meanwhile, the skin of the middle of my left foot has broken open due to the tightness.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandfather True to size, wide toe box and Easy to get on He loves them
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love Velcro
customer_reviews.text: Ease of getting shoes off and on, they adjust to as my foot swells after suffering a stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes for those who struggle with pulling on shoes or with shoe laces. Great look!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe/Narrow heel
customer_reviews.text: The heel is too narrow for my dad. These are great looking shoes; sorry I have to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Wifey likes 'em too!
customer_reviews.text: Being retired, I do not require work boots or anything that would stand out in a board room. For an olde guy, the hook-and-loop closure is super. These Hush Puppies are no bother to slip on and off. They look good, are well made and fit nicely. Also, my feet have a tendency to swell at the end of the day. The easy, hook-and-loop adjustment is another positive. Again Amazon Prime delivery was terrific. Plus, Wifey says they look good; that alone added another star!
customer_reviews.author: harry12

customer_reviews.title: Not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my 81 year old Dad. I didn’t have high hopes he would like them. Well, he loved them. His feet swell and he insists on wearing heavy wool socks. There is breathing room in these wide shoes. Recommend and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl R

customer_reviews.title: As Comfortable As A Pair Of Slippers
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable and probably the lightest I've ever worn. They were flexible right from the start and required no breaking in. This is my second pair and I am looking forward to another two years of comfort. I would like to see a tougher material in the heal. I drive vans and cars for a living and the right heal wore on an angle. However, since that wear is not common to most people, I think the majority of purchasers will be quite satisfied with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Backdraft

customer_reviews.title: Look for high-quality
customer_reviews.text: They look cheap and they didn’t fit I bought hush puppies shoes in the past where is the leather looked nice The Leather worked on most fake did not like them at all
customer_reviews.author: w30olds442

customer_reviews.title: they are comfortable enough.
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a shoe that I could just slip on without a shoe horn or having to bend over to get on. These shoes are plenty wide around the ball of my foot but still too narrow at the ankle. So back to the shoe horn. Maybe as they break in they will slip on easier. I am hoping. Once on, they are comfortable enough.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM B MATHIS

customer_reviews.title: Hush Puppies are the greatest
customer_reviews.text: My husband has pain througout his whole body every day of the week due to multiple surgeries that just went wrong. I bought him these Hush Puppies to possibly help his feet that are also in pain all the time. These fit him perfectly in a size 11-1/2 EE. He is happy to have really comfortable new shoes and I am happy that he is happy. Win/win situation all the way around! Thank you Hush Puppies and Amazon for giving him a little bit of relief!
customer_reviews.author: Barb Mayer 724

customer_reviews.title: Shoes that fit right
customer_reviews.text: My feet are hard fit. Often must get them too long to be wide enough. These shoes came in the correct width and length. Hush Puppies have been known to be comfortable, these lived up to that; wore them all day right out of the box. Am unstable due to neuropathy in my feet, this style has a good sized sole to keep me steady. Well made; plus, they had a great price.
customer_reviews.author: DrCeeRay

customer_reviews.title: Good, comfortable, handsome shoe
customer_reviews.text: My dad is 88 years old and is very picky. He loves his Hush puppies!
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Good value, good shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes because they are exactly the same as the pair I have worn almost exclusively for several years. The old ones are still comfortable and still look ok but the soles are beginning to separate from the shoes so I am forced to retire them. Hope the new ones are as durable and give the same satisfaction as the old ones did and when they wear out I hope I can find another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bird

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have accurate shoe size.
customer_reviews.text: It is important to measure your largest foot accurately (surprisingly your feet are not identical), both width and length (either inches or cm). Then refer to several on-line size charts that show your measurements in relation to shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: David Yell

customer_reviews.title: Good material; but if your feet are swollen it will be tight.
customer_reviews.text: My dads feet are swollen so I bought a bigger size; but there is a metal piece of bar across the top area of your foot; on top. It does not allow for the show to stregth or give.
customer_reviews.author: Constance

customer_reviews.title: Have worn this specific shoe for more than a decade and LOVE them!
customer_reviews.text: After ten years, I have gotten two more pairs of Hush Puppies H18800!
customer_reviews.author: David W

customer_reviews.title: First Hush Pupplies in years!
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 10.5 or size 11 depending on the shoe. As I couldn't try them on before ordering, I went with size 11 to be on the safe side. They fit a little loose without socks but just fine with socks. They are very light and the leather is firm but soft. I really like the one Velcro strap as opposed to the two strap system. Very comfortable shoes. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my Dad quite while ago and they look super nice. They are wearing really well. No scuffs at all.
customer_reviews.author: hlmh

customer_reviews.title: Hus Puppies Slip-on for Men
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pair of shoes for my 95-year old father and he really seemed to like them. He said they were quite comfortable and they were easier for him to put on (velcro closure rather than laces). I ordered his size and thought this pair fit him perfectly. Unfortunately, my father passed away shortlly after receiving this gift, so I brought the pair of shoes to a homeless shelter... and pray that someone else is enjoying the comfort and fit as much as my father did.
customer_reviews.author: Meema of Eight

customer_reviews.title: fit my high arch
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for someone with a high arch. The velcro strap is good for those of us who have trouble tying shoe laces. I would recommend them to anyone, but especially the elderly (like me).
customer_reviews.author: robert ely

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, stylish
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, comfortable, stylish.... really nice. My father did not take it off from the first try until it was time for bed. The next day, he willingly handed his old stand by which he swore he will never find a replacement for. In comparison to other shoes of it's kind, these looked sleek. Most others looked like miniature tugboats on his feet.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered several pair for my husband. He loves the fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Margie L. Hooker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I was sorry when I found the size 13 was too big
customer_reviews.author: gar yeske

customer_reviews.title: Purchased these shoes for my 77 yo husband. He loves them.
customer_reviews.text: This is his 3rd pair, I keep 1-pair in the closet for a spare.
customer_reviews.author: Marti

customer_reviews.title: Super light
customer_reviews.text: My father has deformed feet from arthritis. Purchased a black pair of these shoes a half a size bigger than these and he thought they were a little loose. However these were too small going down a half size. They are super light weight and look great on. Had to return these. Probably would have had to get the 3E instead of the 2E.
customer_reviews.author: swfan

product_meta.title: Hush Puppies Gil, Men's Gil
product_meta.description: Crafted in smooth full grain leather, our Gil slip-on men�s sneakers are for guys of every generation thanks to the new range of colors that up the fashion ante on these traditional sneakers. Add or remove the contoured footbed in this pair to customize the comfort level with ease. Finished with a vintage-style hook-and-loop closure on the front, these leather sneakers are crafted with our durable ZeroG� outsole, making it easier than ever to tackle long days on your feet. Pair them with jeans, trousers, or shorts this season, and add a pair of printed socks to really rock the look. Crafted in full grain leather. ZeroG� - Built with super-lightweight materials, this outsole keeps your feet at ease all day long. Easy hook-and-loop closure. Removable, contoured EVA footbed with an open cell mesh cover for additional cushioning. Molded ZeroG� lightweight outsole provides flexibility and traction. PDAC approved.
feature_bullets: Removable, contoured EVA footbed with an open cell mesh cover provides additional cushioning. Strobel construction and a contoured last bottom allow for flexibility and sole comfort. Exclusive Zero G™ technology incorporates an ultralightweight and shock absorbing Elon® midsole with a long-wearing Rubberlon outsole. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 1 lb 1 oz Product measurements were taken using size 8.5, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weig
The casual Gil from Hush Puppies® are so light, they're almost weightless!
Smooth leather upper with tonal stitching and moc-toe design offers a clean, casual appearance.
Fully cushioned provides a comfortable, customized fit.
